item.description:
In this giveaway, sponsored by  70th anniversary edition of The Little Prince, we wanted to hear your stories inspired by some favorite quotes from the book. item.title: Revenge Stories: A Reading List
item.dc:creator: Cassandra Neace
item.description:
This installment of the Riot Recommendation is sponsored by Dark Triumph by Robin LaFevers. Sybella’s duty as Death’s assassin in 15th-century France forces her return home to the personal hell that she had finally escaped. Love and romance, history and magic, vengeance and salvation converge in this thrilling sequel to Grave Mercy. Sybella arrives at the convent’s doorstep half [...]

item.description:

item.title: A Ludicrously Luxurious Law Library

item.title: Can You Guess These Classic Fictional Characters Just By Their Description?
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description:
One of literature’s weaknesses is visualization: we can readily remember who the characters are, what they do, and what they are like, but if I asked you to describe the physical characteristics of some of literature’s greatest characters, how would you do? item.description:
